sentence: Unilever NV ( UN ) will begin trading ex-dividend on May 08, 2013.
A cash dividend payment of $0.3494 per share is scheduled to be paid on June 12, 2013.
Shareholders who purchased UN stock prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 7.94% increase over the prior quarter.
At the current stock price of $42.54, the dividend yield is 3.29%.
The previous trading day's last sale of UN was $42.54, representing a -1.05% decrease from the 52 week high of $42.99 and a 39.75% increase over the 52 week low of $30.44.
UN is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
Zacks Investment Research reports UN's forecasted earnings growth in 2013 as 4.98%, compared to an industry average of 19.5%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the UN Dividend History page.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
